section.title: Preparing working loads before upgrading
section.para: You should prepare your working loads before upgrading by consolidating all of your instances to one or more computes. Once the upgrade is complete, reboot the empty computes and then move the images from the remaining non-rebooted computes to the newly booted computes.

section.title: Using RHEL as a Ceph Client
section.para: To upgrade existing &rhla; compute nodes to the appropriate version of the Ceph client, execute the steps in before executing the hlm-upgrade.yml playbook.
